name: Armiger's Mobility
prereq: Expert In Heavy Armor; Hellknight Armiger Dedication
summary: You’ve learned how best to move in heavy armor.
description:
You’ve learned how best to move in heavy armor. When wearing heavy armor, if you meet the Strength requirement, instead of reducing the movement penalty by 5 feet, you reduce the penalty by 10 feet (typically reducing the penalty to 0). If you are a dwarf with the Unburdened Iron feat, increase your Speed by 5 feet.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
